definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: † [[אָמֵן]] adv. verily, truly De 27:15, De 27:26 (12 t.) 1Ki 1:36, Ne 5:13, Je 11:5, Je 28:6 & doxologies 1Ch 16:36 ( = Ps 106:48); [[אָמֵן]] ([[ו]])[[אָמֵן ]] Nu 5:22 (P) Ne 8:6, & in the doxologies Ps 41:14, Ps 72:19, Ps 89:53, Ps 106:48. a)mh/n = Amen: [[אֱלֽהֵי אָמֵן]] Is 65:16, Is 65:16 God of Amen De Che RVm; cf. Rev 3:14, or God of faithfulness, God of truth (RV) (perh. rd. [[אׂמֶן]] Che Di).
